1: כְּרָפְאִ֣י <sup>7495 </sup> <n>When I would have healed</n> לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> וְנִגְלָ֞ה <sup>1540 </sup> <n>was discovered</n> עֲוֹ֤ן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>then the iniquity</n> אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>of Ephraim</n> וְרָע֣וֹת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>and the wickedness</n> שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פָעֲל֖וּ <sup>6466 </sup> <n>for they commit</n> שָׁ֑קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>falsehood</n> וְגַנָּ֣ב <sup>1590 </sup> <n>and the thief</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh in</n> פָּשַׁ֥ט <sup>6584 </sup> <n>of robbers spoileth</n> גְּד֖וּד <sup>1416 </sup> <n>[and] the troop</n> בַּחֽוּץ׃ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without</n>
2: וּבַל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>not</n> יֹֽאמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>And they consider</n> לִלְבָבָ֔ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>not in their hearts</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> רָעָתָ֖ם <sup>7451 </sup> <n>all their wickedness</n> זָכָ֑רְתִּי <sup>2142 </sup> <n>[that] I remember</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> סְבָב֣וּם <sup>5437 </sup> <n>have beset them about</n> מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>4611 </sup> <n>now their own doings</n> נֶ֥גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>are before</n> פָּנַ֖י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>they are before my face</n> הָיֽוּ׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
3: בְּרָעָתָ֖ם <sup>7451 </sup> <n>with their wickedness</n> יְשַׂמְּחוּ־ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>glad</n> מֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>They make the king</n> וּבְכַחֲשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <sup>3585 </sup> <n>with their lies</n> שָׂרִֽים׃ <sup>8269 </sup> <n>and the princes</n>
4: כֻּלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>are all</n> מְנָ֣אֲפִ֔ים <sup>5003 </sup> <n>They [are] all adulterers</n> כְּמ֣וֹ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>Like</n> תַנּ֔וּר <sup>8574 </sup> <n>as an oven</n> בֹּעֵ֖רָה <sup>1197 </sup> <n>heated</n> מֵֽאֹפֶ֑ה <sup>644 </sup> <n>by the baker</n> יִשְׁבּ֣וֹת <sup>7673 </sup> <n>[who] ceaseth</n> מֵעִ֔יר <sup>5782 </sup> <n>from raising</n> מִלּ֥וּשׁ <sup>3888 </sup> <n>after he hath kneaded</n> בָּצֵ֖ק <sup>1217 </sup> <n>the dough</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> חֻמְצָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>2556 </sup> <n>until it be leavened</n>
5: י֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In the day</n> מַלְכֵּ֔נוּ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of our king</n> הֶחֱל֥וּ <sup>2470 </sup> <n>have made [him] sick</n> שָׂרִ֖ים <sup>8269 </sup> <n>the princes</n> חֲמַ֣ת <sup>2573 </sup> <n>bottle</n> מִיָּ֑יִן <sup>3196 </sup> <n>of wine</n> מָשַׁ֥ךְ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>he stretched out</n> יָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>his hand</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> לֹצְצִֽים׃ <sup>3945 </sup> <n>with scorners</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>they</n> קֵרְב֧וּ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>For they have made ready</n> כַתַּנּ֛וּר <sup>8574 </sup> <n>like an oven</n> לִבָּ֖ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>their heart</n> בְּאָרְבָּ֑ם <sup>693 </sup> <n>whiles they lie in wait</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <sup>3915 </sup> <n>all the night</n> יָשֵׁ֣ן <sup>3462 </sup> <n>grow old</n> אֹֽפֵהֶ֔ם <sup>644 </sup> <n>their baker</n> בֹּ֕קֶר <sup>1242 </sup> <n>in the morning</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it</n> בֹעֵ֖ר <sup>1197 </sup> <n>it burneth</n> כְּאֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>fire</n> לֶהָבָֽה׃ <sup>3852 </sup> <n>as a flaming</n>
7: כֻּלָּ֤ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> יֵחַ֙מּוּ֙ <sup>2552 </sup> <n>They are all hot</n> כַּתַּנּ֔וּר <sup>8574 </sup> <n>as an oven</n> וְאָכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and have devoured</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֹֽׁפְטֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>8199 </sup> <n>their judges</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>4428 </sup> <n>all their kings</n> נָפָ֔לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>are fallen</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>None</n> קֹרֵ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>[there is] none among them that calleth</n> בָהֶ֖ם אֵלָֽי׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n>
8: אֶפְרַ֕יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> בָּעַמִּ֖ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>himself among the people</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>himself</n> יִתְבּוֹלָ֑ל <sup>1101 </sup> <n>he hath mixed</n> אֶפְרַ֛יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> עֻגָ֖ה <sup>5692 </sup> <n>is a cake</n> בְּלִ֥י <sup>1097 </sup> <n>not</n> הֲפוּכָֽה׃ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>not turned</n>
9: אָכְל֤וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>have devoured</n> זָרִים֙ <sup>2114 </sup> <n>Strangers</n> כֹּח֔וֹ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>his strength</n> וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָדָ֑ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and he knoweth</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> שֵׂיבָה֙ <sup>7872 </sup> <n>[it] not yea gray hairs</n> זָ֣רְקָה <sup>2236 </sup> <n>are here and there</n> בּ֔וֹ וְה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יָדָֽע׃ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>upon him yet he knoweth</n>
10: וְעָנָ֥ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>testifieth</n> גְאֽוֹן־ <sup>1347 </sup> <n>And the pride</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בְּפָנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>to his face</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> שָׁ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and they do not return</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>to the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>their God</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> בִקְשֻׁ֖הוּ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>nor seek</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>for all</n> זֹֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n>
11: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has become</n> אֶפְרַ֔יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> כְּיוֹנָ֥ה <sup>3123 </sup> <n>dove</n> פוֹתָ֖ה <sup>6601 </sup> <n>also is like a silly</n> אֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>without</n> לֵ֑ב <sup>3820 </sup> <n>without heart</n> מִצְרַ֥יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>to Egypt</n> קָרָ֖אוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>they call</n> אַשּׁ֥וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>to Assyria</n> הָלָֽכוּ׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>they go</n>
12: כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>they</n> יֵלֵ֗כוּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> אֶפְר֤וֹשׂ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>I will spread</n> עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רִשְׁתִּ֔י <sup>7568 </sup> <n>my net</n> כְּע֥וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>as the fowls</n> הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of the heaven</n> אֽוֹרִידֵ֑ם <sup>3381 </sup> <n>upon them I will bring them down</n> אַיְסִרֵ֕ם <sup>3256 </sup> <n>I will chastise</n> כְּשֵׁ֖מַע <sup>8088 </sup> <n>hath heard</n> לַעֲדָתָֽם׃ <sup>5712 </sup> <n>them as their congregation</n> ס
13: א֤וֹי <sup>188 </sup> <n>Woe</n> לָהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נָדְד֣וּ <sup>5074 </sup> <n>unto them for they have fled</n> מִמֶּ֔נִּי <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> שֹׁ֥ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>from me destruction</n> לָהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פָ֣שְׁעוּ <sup>6586 </sup> <n>unto them because they have transgressed</n> בִ֑י וְאָנֹכִ֣י <sup>595 </sup> <n>would</n> אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <sup>6299 </sup> <n>against me though I have redeemed</n> וְהֵ֕מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> דִּבְּר֥וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>them yet they have spoken</n> עָלַ֖י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> כְּזָבִֽים׃ <sup>3577 </sup> <n>lies</n>
14: וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> זָעֲק֤וּ <sup>2199 </sup> <n>And they have not cried</n> אֵלַי֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> בְּלִבָּ֔ם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>unto me with their heart</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יְיֵלִ֖ילוּ <sup>3213 </sup> <n>when they howled</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>the sake</n> מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָ֑ם <sup>4904 </sup> <n>upon their beds</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>the sake</n> דָּגָ֧ן <sup>1715 </sup> <n>themselves for corn</n> וְתִיר֛וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and wine</n> יִתְגּוֹרָ֖רוּ <sup>1481 </sup> <n>they assemble</n> יָס֥וּרוּ <sup>5493 </sup> <n>[and] they rebel</n> בִֽי׃
15: וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יִסַּ֔רְתִּי <sup>3256 </sup> <n>Though I have bound</n> חִזַּ֖קְתִּי <sup>2388 </sup> <n>[and] strengthened</n> זְרֽוֹעֹתָ֑ם <sup>2220 </sup> <n>their arms</n> וְאֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> יְחַשְּׁבוּ־ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>yet do they imagine</n> רָֽע׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>mischief</n>
16: יָשׁ֣וּבוּ ׀ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>They return</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> עָ֗ל <sup>5920 </sup> <n>[but] not to the most High</n> הָיוּ֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <sup>7198 </sup> <n>bow</n> רְמִיָּ֔ה <sup>7423 </sup> <n>they are like a deceitful</n> יִפְּל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall fall</n> בַחֶ֛רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> שָׂרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>8269 </sup> <n>their princes</n> מִזַּ֣עַם <sup>2195 </sup> <n>for the rage</n> לְשׁוֹנָ֑ם <sup>3956 </sup> <n>of their tongue</n> ז֥וֹ <sup>2097 </sup> <n>this</n> לַעְגָּ֖ם <sup>3933 </sup> <n>[shall be] their derision</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
